div1.p: Moses Austin in account with Daniel Black.
Moses Austin to Danl. Black Dr.

To making a Coat and ripping the same__________ 5. 50
To 2 Skeins of Silk____________________________ . 25
To Making a Coat for your Son__________________ 5. 00
To furnishing Button Moles_____________________ . 25 ______ $11. 00
